item.title: HOW TO Get Started with WordPress Multisite - build it in 5 minutes
item.description: WordPress Multisite or WordPress Network or WPMU - any of these refer to WordPress when it has been setup as a network of blogs or websites.

item.title: Pros and Cons of Post Formats vs. WordPress Multisite
item.description: WordPress is a flexible solution for web publishing. Post Formats were introduced a couple of years back to help users and developers to create content in one WYSIWYG Editor but show it differently on the site.

item.title: Change your WordPress Multi-Site Domain URL
item.description: I’ve just finished changing my domain name URL for my WordPress multisite.
